Package index

Competition

Metadata

Retrieve values of arguments for specific data collection functions across all package

getCompetitionHistory() getCompetitionRounds() getCompetitionPhases() getCompetitionTeams() getCompetitionGames() experimental
Competition metadata

Data

getCompetitionStandings()
Get competition traditional standings
getCompetitionCalendar()
Get competition calendar standings
getCompetitionAheadBehind()
Get competition ahead-behind standings
getCompetitionMargins()
Get competition margins standings
getCompetitionStreaks()
Get competition streaks standings

Team and player

Metadata

Retrieve contextual information about teams and players. Outputs may be required as arguments of other getTeam* or getPlayer* functions

getTeam() getTeamPeople() getTeamGames() experimental
Team metadata

Team Data

getTeamStats() experimental
Get team statistics
getTeamLeadStats() experimental
Get team lead statistics

Get player statistics
getPlayerAdvanced() experimental
Get player advanced statistics

Get player miscellaneous statistics

Get player points statistics

Data
